definition: The capacity and exercise of agents to influence their own working conditions, make autonomous decisions, and advocate for their interests

positive_examples: I'm not comfortable with that assignment and would like to discuss alternatives
The workers voiced their concerns about safety conditions
The agent requested clarification before proceeding
Employees proposed changes to the workflow
I need to set a boundary around after-hours communication
negative_examples: The policy was announced by leadership
training_hints.disambiguation: Agent-initiated assertion of interests, not management processes

simplex_mapping.mapping_rationale: Worker agency is the expression of autonomy in workplace contexts
